author: By MARILYNN MARCHIONE AP Chief Medical Writer
title: Malaria drugs' promise for coronavirus spurs hope, shortages
description: Excitement about treating the new coronavirus with malaria drugs is raising hopes, including with President Donald Trump. But the evidence that they may help is thin, and a run on the drugs is complicating access for people who need them…
